title: ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData.D2PatternSeedOnly
description: Gets or sets whether to create a pattern in Direction 2 using the seed component only, without replicating the pattern instances of Direction 1, in this bidirectional linear component pattern feature.
returns: True to create a pattern in Direction 2 using the seed component only without replicating the pattern instances of Direction 1, false to not
remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this property.
For more information, see the
Linear Component Pattern PropertyManager
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help.
